english.segment1: Holy Spirit Come. Holy Spirit Stay. I need to feel your fire. I need to feel your gaze (2x)
english.segment2: Won't you come. Breathe over me (4x)
english.segment3: Just one drink. Becomes a river. Just one drink. Becomes a flood, yes Lord (2x)
english.segment5: Drink in deep. Drink in deep, yeah (5x)
english.segment6: Here we go, open it up. Open it up
english.segment7: Open the floodgates. Open the floodgates (16x)
english.segment8: Open it up. Open it up, Lord. Open it up. Open it up
english.segment10: I need to feel your gaze. I wanna see the fire. In your eyes (2x). I am living for one thing (2x)
english.segment11: Oh, I see an open door. I hear the voice of an angel. Come up here Oh, he's calling 'Come up here'
english.segment12: I see an open door. I hear a voice that's calling. He's calling 'Come up here'. He's calling 'Come up here'
